title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Isaac SDK and Isaac Sim
description: Welcome to the first chapter of our exploration into the NVIDIA Isaac platform. In this chapter, we will introduce the two core components of the Isaac ecosystem: the NVIDIA Isaac SDK and NVIDIA Isaac Sim. We will cover their features, installation, and basic usage, and guide you through your first simulation in the Isaac Sim environment.

frontMatter.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Isaac SDK and Isaac Sim
